mapper.select: select user_info_uuid, name, bio, email, banner, create_at, update_at, role_name from user_info_view where user_info_uuid = #{uuid}

select ui.user_info_uuid, ui.name, ui.bio, ui.email, ui.banner, ui.create_at, ui.update_at, ui.role_name from user_info_view ui inner join user_login ul on ul.user_info_uuid = ui.user_info_uuid where ul.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_info_uuid, role_id, name, bio, email, banner, create_at, update_at) values (#{userUuid}, 2,#{name},#{bio},#{email},#{banner},now(),now())
insert into user_login(user_info_uuid, userid, passwd, create_at, update_at) values (#{userUuid},#{userid},#{passwd},now(),now())
